name: Trapping Hands
description: Develop hand control techniques that allow rapid offense and defense within close-range combat.

cards.title: Pak Sao (Slap Block)
cards.description: A redirection technique that deflects an opponent’s attack to create an opening.
bulletpoints: Use the palm to deflect an incoming strike sideways
Maintain relaxed shoulders for quicker follow-up

cards.title: Lop Sao (Grab and Pull)
cards.description: A technique used to trap and pull an opponent’s arm, disrupting their attack.
bulletpoints: Grip the opponent’s wrist firmly while pulling
Keep elbows close to the body for better leverage
Follow up with a counterstrike or takedown
